title: Please Wait Until Spring - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Alternate World   Animal Characteristics   Beastkin   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Orphans   Sleeping   Strong Love Interests   Weak Protagonist
author: Date Kiyo   伊達きよ
description: It’s winter and Rick, a squirrel beastman, is preparing for his upcoming hibernation. One night, just a day before his hibernation holiday, his apartment building catches fire. Rick loses his house, his nuts, his blankets, his cushions and everything else he had bought. A kind fireman sees his grief and says: “I have a colleague going on hibernation leave starting tomorrow.” A hibernation story about a large bear and a small squirrel.>
